name: Black and White Game
description:
You have been sent on an unknown mission in a black and white world filled with monsters and strange characters. Fight through caves, mines, and strange, blue carnivals to complete your mission.

This game was made with RPG Maker VX Ace. It was inspired by the game OFF by Mortis Ghost, Undertale by Toby Fox, and Oneshot by Little Cat Feet. I hope you enjoy it and please give feedback on what I can improve. The game is about 1 hour and 30 minutes long.
